stockmarketsim

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarketsim.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the stock market simulation

                  ExtEvent[] events,

        Parameters:
        stockMarket - The main stock market for the simulation to use
        events - A list of events that may run in the future
        startDate - The date to start the simulation on
